name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Accomplished Senior Security Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development and security-focused solutions. Proficient in **Python**, **PowerShell**, and cloud technologies including **Azure**. Expertise in security frameworks and standards such as **NIST**, **ISO 27001**, and **SOC2**. Skilled in leveraging **Microsoft Defender**, **Microsoft Sentinel**, and **Microsoft Purview** for effective security management and incident response. Strong knowledge of SIEM and EDR practices, utilizing methodologies such as **MITRE ATT&CK** to enhance cybersecurity protocols. Known for delivering high-performing, secure systems and contributing significantly to projects at leading organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
